name: Fruit Adventure That Is Quite Unadorned
name_original: Fruit Adventure That Is Quite Unadorned
description: Hey Itch fiends, this is a project I've been working on for the past few months. It is unfinished but I feel I've at least made enough progress to show it off. There is no ending or anything so just think of it as a test demo. There is a secret hint for readers of the description. Try jumping twice quickly.
